concept.title: GCPARALLEL Command
concept.shortdesc: Creates a parallel geometric constraint on 2D entities.

conbody.p: Create a parallel constraint to ensure linear entities remain parallel to each other.

section.title: Methods to create a parallel constraint
section.p:
There is one method to create a parallel constraint:
Select first entity

dlentry.dd: Begin creating a parallel constraint by selecting a linear entity then:
Select a second linear entity to make parallel to the first. The first entity maintains its position while the second entity moves, as necessary, to become parallel to the first entity.
